Class AuthWrapper

java.lang.Object
io.mindspice.simplypages.editing.AuthWrapper
public class AuthWrapper extends Object
Optional authentication/authorization wrapper for edit operations.

Provides a standardized pattern for protecting edit endpoints with permission checks. Framework users can use this utility to wrap their edit actions with auth checks, or implement their own authorization patterns.

Usage Example:

@GetMapping("/api/modules/{id}/edit")
@ResponseBody
public String editModule(@PathVariable String id, Principal principal) {
    return AuthWrapper.requireForEdit(
        () -> canUserEdit(id, principal.getName()),
        () -> {
            Module module = findModule(id);
            EditAdapter<?> adapter = (EditAdapter<?>) module;
            return EditModalBuilder.create()
                .withTitle("Edit Module")
                .withEditView(adapter.buildEditView())
                .withSaveUrl("/api/modules/" + id + "/update")
                .build()
                .render();
        }
    );
}

Custom Unauthorized Handler:

return AuthWrapper.require(
    () -> hasPermission(user, resource),
    () -> performAction(),
    () -> customUnauthorizedResponse()
);

  • Method Details

    • require

      public static <T> T require(Supplier<Boolean> authCheck, Supplier<T> action, Supplier<T> unauthorizedHandler)
      Generic authorization wrapper with custom unauthorized handler.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Return type of the action
      Parameters:
      authCheck - Supplier that returns true if action is authorized
      action - Action to perform if authorized
      unauthorizedHandler - Response to return if not authorized
      Returns:
      Result of action if authorized, otherwise result of unauthorizedHandler

    • requireForEdit

      public static String requireForEdit(Supplier<Boolean> authCheck, Supplier<String> action)
      Authorization wrapper for edit operations with default unauthorized modal.

      Returns a Modal with "Unauthorized" title and "Permission denied" error message if the auth check fails.

      Parameters:
      authCheck - Supplier that returns true if edit is authorized
      action - Action to perform if authorized (typically returns Modal HTML)
      Returns:
      Result of action if authorized, otherwise unauthorized modal

    • requireForEdit

      public static String requireForEdit(Supplier<Boolean> authCheck, Supplier<String> action, String errorMessage)
      Authorization wrapper for edit operations with custom error message.
      Parameters:
      authCheck - Supplier that returns true if edit is authorized
      action - Action to perform if authorized
      errorMessage - Custom error message to display if unauthorized
      Returns:
      Result of action if authorized, otherwise modal with custom error

    • requireForDelete

      public static String requireForDelete(Supplier<Boolean> authCheck, Supplier<String> action)
      Authorization wrapper for delete operations with default unauthorized modal.
      Parameters:
      authCheck - Supplier that returns true if delete is authorized
      action - Action to perform if authorized
      Returns:
      Result of action if authorized, otherwise unauthorized modal

    • requireForCreate

      public static String requireForCreate(Supplier<Boolean> authCheck, Supplier<String> action)
      Authorization wrapper for create operations with default unauthorized modal.
      Parameters:
      authCheck - Supplier that returns true if create is authorized
      action - Action to perform if authorized
      Returns:
      Result of action if authorized, otherwise unauthorized modal
